Sentencas: Gd2O3 and Lu2O3 double-doped Bi2O3 compounds were prepared by solid-state synthesis techniques.
Titulo: Thermo-electrical and structural properties of Gd2O3 and Lu2O3 double-doped Bi2O3

Sentencas: Eight micro crystalline samples were synthesized with compositions of (Bi2O3)(1-x-y)(Gd2O3)(x)(Lu2O3)(y), where x = 0.05, 0.1 and y = 0.05, 0.1, 0.15, 0.2.
Titulo: Thermo-electrical and structural properties of Gd2O3 and Lu2O3 double-doped Bi2O3

Sentencas: The structure of the ceramic materials was characterized by X-ray powder diffraction (XRD) and Thermo Gravimetry/Differential Thermal Analysis (TG/DTA).
Titulo: Thermo-electrical and structural properties of Gd2O3 and Lu2O3 double-doped Bi2O3

Sentencas: The morphology of the materials of the system was displayed by Scanning Electron Microscope (SEM).
Titulo: Thermo-electrical and structural properties of Gd2O3 and Lu2O3 double-doped Bi2O3

Sentencas: Also, the electrical conductivity of the samples was determined by the DC four-point probe technique (4PPT) in air at temperatures ranging from room temperature to 1100 degrees C.
Titulo: Thermo-electrical and structural properties of Gd2O3 and Lu2O3 double-doped Bi2O3

Sentencas: It was observed that two samples, (Bi2O3)(1.-x-y)(Gd2O3)(x)(Lu2O3)(y) x = 0.05-0.1, y = 0.05 have mixture phases including delta-phase before additional heat treatments, and that the phases of all of the samples changed to the stable fluorite type face centered cubic delta-Bi2O3 phase which has a high conductivity property after electrical conductivity measurements.
Titulo: Thermo-electrical and structural properties of Gd2O3 and Lu2O3 double-doped Bi2O3

Sentencas: The DTA results also showed that all samples have delta-Bi2O3 phases.
Titulo: Thermo-electrical and structural properties of Gd2O3 and Lu2O3 double-doped Bi2O3

Sentencas: The highest electrical conductivity was seen for the sample of the (Bi2O3)(0.85)(Gd2O3)(0.1)(Lu2O3)(0.05) system as 9.20 x 10(-2) (ohm.cm)(-1) at 650 degrees C.
Titulo: Thermo-electrical and structural properties of Gd2O3 and Lu2O3 double-doped Bi2O3

Sentencas: The lowest activation energy was also calculated for the sample of the (Bi2O3)(0.8)(-Gd2O3)(0.1)(Lu2O3)(0.1) system as 0.5104 eV.
Titulo: Thermo-electrical and structural properties of Gd2O3 and Lu2O3 double-doped Bi2O3

Sentencas: The results indicated that the stable delta-Bi2O3 phase samples can be used as electrolyte materials in solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Thermo-electrical and structural properties of Gd2O3 and Lu2O3 double-doped Bi2O3
